title: Redundant Inheritance of `OwnableUpgradeable`
content:
**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `1b2dc63`.

![Image 86: Alert icon](https://certificate.quantstamp.com/full/sapien/ffb7e698-6178-46f0-8df8-52e537af70c0/static/media/success-icon-alert.4e26c8d3b65fdf9f4f0789a4086052ba.svg)

**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `6e709c1891cad3620aa7f64e2d29b60ba159aa6f`. The client provided the following explanation:

> Inheritance of OwnableUpgradeable removed.

![Image 87: Alert icon](https://certificate.quantstamp.com/full/sapien/ffb7e698-6178-46f0-8df8-52e537af70c0/static/media/success-icon-alert.4e26c8d3b65fdf9f4f0789a4086052ba.svg)

**Update**
Marked as "Fixed" by the client. Addressed in: `6e709c1891cad3620aa7f64e2d29b60ba159aa6f`. The client provided the following explanation:

> Inheritance of OwnableUpgradeable removed.

**File(s) affected:**`SapTestToken.sol`

**Description:** The `SapTestToken` contract inherits from `OwnableUpgradeable` but makes no use of its functionality.

**Recommendation:** Consider removing the inheritance from `OwnableUpgradeable` if there are no plans to use its functionality in the codebase.
